name: Tosculi Elite Bow Raider
description: The Tosculi Elite Bow Raider is a Medium humanoid with remarkable dexterity, excelling in ranged combat while being resilient in melee situations. It has a strong bow and claws for close encounters.
memorable: This creature's ability to enhance ranged attacks and its connection to its hive queen is particularly unique.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through superior ranged attacks and tactical mobility.
relations: Part of a hive, may work alongside other Tosculi or serve a hive queen.
environment: Typically found in areas where it can utilize its stealth and mobility for ambush tactics.
strengths: Exceptional mobility allowing repositioning, high dexterity enhancing attack rolls, and good resilience from its Constitution score.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on ranged attacks; can struggle in close combat without support.
attacks: Can perform dual attacks using either claws in melee or longbow from a distance, capable of significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Archery ability allows for extra damage on ranged weapon attacks.
senses: Possesses darkvision, enabling it to see in low light conditions, and has a passive Perception of 15 for heightened awareness.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and Perception, further enhancing its ability to ambush and detect threats.
additional_information: Can detect its hive queen within 300 feet.
Gains advantage on ranged attacks within 5 feet without suffering disadvantage.
Utilizes Skirmisher ability for tactical movement.
test_queries: elite fighter with queen detection ability
skirmisher that excels in ambush tactics
